Author: raju

Author: jsmcgd
Title: Portal is the most subversive game ever

Author: asciilifeform
Content: ROT-13. When that fails, XOR with a key posted in the text. Effective automated censorship is NP-complete.

Author: aswanson
Content: If you learn hardware first, pointers are pretty easy.  However, learning hardware inevitably slants your thinking towards solving ALL problems in those terms, which is bad for higher level architecture and design thought processes.  When all you have is a hammer...

Author: hhm
Content: Darcs is also a very interesting option. Have you tried it? I've been using it for one week after a few years using SVN and it seems like a very viable option.
